ExponentialRolloutRate.description: Allows you to create an exponential rate of rollout for a job.

properties.name: BaseRatePerMinute
properties.description: The minimum number of things that will be notified of a pending job, per minute at the start of job rollout. This parameter allows you to define the initial rate of rollout.

type.description: The minimum number of things that will be notified of a pending job, per minute at the start of job rollout. This parameter allows you to define the initial rate of rollout.

properties.name: IncrementFactor
properties.description: The exponential factor to increase the rate of rollout for a job.

type.description: The exponential factor to increase the rate of rollout for a job.

properties.name: RateIncreaseCriteria
properties.description: The criteria to initiate the increase in rate of rollout for a job.

type.description: The criteria to initiate the increase in rate of rollout for a job.

AbortCriteria.description: The criteria that determine when and how a job abort takes place.

properties.name: Action
properties.description: The type of job action to take to initiate the job abort.

type.description: The type of job action to take to initiate the job abort.

properties.name: FailureType
properties.description: The type of job execution failures that can initiate a job abort.

type.description: The type of job execution failures that can initiate a job abort.

properties.name: MinNumberOfExecutedThings
properties.description: The minimum number of things which must receive job execution notifications before the job can be aborted.

type.description: The minimum number of things which must receive job execution notifications before the job can be aborted.

properties.name: ThresholdPercentage
properties.description: The minimum percentage of job execution failures that must occur to initiate the job abort.

type.description: The minimum percentage of job execution failures that must occur to initiate the job abort.

InProgressTimeoutInMinutes.description: Specifies the amount of time, in minutes, this device has to finish execution of this job.

RoleArn.description: The ARN of an IAM role that grants grants permission to download files from the S3 bucket where the job data/updates are stored. The role must also grant permission for IoT to download the files.

ExpiresInSec.description: How number (in seconds) pre-signed URLs are valid.

RetryCriteria.description: Specifies how many times a failure type should be retried.

MaintenanceWindow.description: Specifies a start time and duration for a scheduled Job.

DestinationPackageVersion.description: Specifies target package version ARNs for a software update job.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The tag's key.

type.description: The tag's key.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The tag's value.

type.description: The tag's value.

resource.description: Job templates enable you to preconfigure jobs so that you can deploy them to multiple sets of target devices.

properties.name: JobArn
properties.description: Optional for copying a JobTemplate from a pre-existing Job configuration.

type.description: Optional for copying a JobTemplate from a pre-existing Job configuration.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description of the Job Template.

type.description: A description of the Job Template.

properties.name: Document
properties.description: The job document. Required if you don't specify a value for documentSource.

type.description: The job document. Required if you don't specify a value for documentSource.

properties.name: DocumentSource
properties.description: An S3 link to the job document to use in the template. Required if you don't specify a value for document.

type.description: An S3 link to the job document to use in the template. Required if you don't specify a value for document.

properties.name: TimeoutConfig
properties.description: Specifies the amount of time each device has to finish its execution of the job.

type.description: Specifies the amount of time each device has to finish its execution of the job.

properties.name: JobExecutionsRolloutConfig
properties.description: Allows you to create a staged rollout of a job.

type.description: Allows you to create a staged rollout of a job.

properties.name: ExponentialRolloutRate
properties.description: The rate of increase for a job rollout. This parameter allows you to define an exponential rate for a job rollout.

type.description: The rate of increase for a job rollout. This parameter allows you to define an exponential rate for a job rollout.

properties.name: MaximumPerMinute
properties.description: The maximum number of things that will be notified of a pending job, per minute. This parameter allows you to create a staged rollout.

type.description: The maximum number of things that will be notified of a pending job, per minute. This parameter allows you to create a staged rollout.

properties.name: AbortConfig
properties.description: The criteria that determine when and how a job abort takes place.

type.description: The criteria that determine when and how a job abort takes place.

properties.name: PresignedUrlConfig
properties.description: Configuration for pre-signed S3 URLs.

type.description: Configuration for pre-signed S3 URLs.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: Metadata that can be used to manage the JobTemplate.

type.description: Metadata that can be used to manage the JobTemplate.

attributes.description: Job templates enable you to preconfigure jobs so that you can deploy them to multiple sets of target devices.
